horoscopes.title: Aries Weekly Horoscope Starting January 11
content: This week features Venus entering Aquarius, while other planetary influences continue in Capricorn, mirroring the previous period. The Sun, Mars, and Mercury continue to activate your tenth house, suggesting significant developments pertaining to your career and professional life. This period marks a crucial phase for your professional endeavors, characterized by increased official communications, meetings, evaluations, and job related announcements. Anticipate potential shifts such as job changes, promotions, leadership roles, or challenges within management relationships. Prudent handling of these circumstances is advised.

Job seekers will have the closest opportunities to find a new job, but it will be a stressful effort as well. The Sun, Mars and Mercury will aspect the fourth house, so at home also you have to take up a lot of responsibilities. Guests will be coming and you will also conduct some family gatherings, where you will be the centre of attention. Mars will also bring renovation or relocation, as it is the planet for land, so if you were looking for some demolition, and repair, that will come during this week. Since the Sun and Mars are malefics, you can also expect some stressful situation at home.

During this weekend, Venus will move into Aquarius, which will be a very significant and good transit as Venus likes to be in this house. So, you can expect favourable developments in friendships, social networks, and long-term goals. You will get new connections through social gatherings, professional circles, or online platforms, and these relationships will be beneficial to some extent. There will be a better bond with your friends and elderly siblings, and you may even attend a party or business meet too. There will be team work, charity programs and online meetings too.

horoscopes.title: Taurus Weekly Horoscope Starting January 11
content: For Taurus rising, Sun and Moon signs, the major developments will be revolving around travel, education legal matters, spirituality and publishing as the Sun, Mars and Mercury will be in the ninth house. This is a potential period for foreign travels, international collaborations, and learning new skills. The ninth house indicates studies, so you will formally or informally be learning something, alone or with groups. Since the Sun, Mars are malefics and Mercury is also there in the conjunction, you may have some issues with your teachers, mentors or fatherly figures. Please make sure you are not arguing with people in authority too.

These planets will aspect the third house, so, this will be a very busy week as the third house indicates multitasking. So, you need to be physically also prepared as these tasks will make you very tired. There will be a lot of online and offline conversations as well with your siblings, friends and network circles. This is a very good time to start something of your own and also for those who already have own ventures. However, you should not invest huge money in anything as that can bring losses to you, as Mars also indicates financial liabilities too.

Venus will make a move to the air sign of Aquarius, so you will have important events surrounding your career, public image and reputation. This is a good transit so, your activities at work will get noticed, and there are chances for you to get appreciation. Venus indicates creative self-expression, so there will be good opportunities for those who work in creative domain. Job seekers will get new job, so they should use this time to send their resume and attend interviews. Your public image will get a boost and people will appreciate your hard work.

horoscopes.title: Gemini Weekly Horoscope Starting January 11
content: The planets are in the same sign like the last week, but during the weekend Venus will move into Aquarius. The Sun, Mars, and Mercury will be activating the eighth house so, there will be some concrete developments will be unfolding around finances and emotions. There will be a lot of discussions regarding loans, debts, taxes, insurance and PF, so, you should not take any immediate action without expert opinion. The Sun, and Mars, both are natural malefics and their presence in the eighth house will increase the financial liabilities, so try to save as much as you can.

These three planets will aspect the second house, so there will be some quick decisions regarding your investments. You can expect new payment structures, pricing changes, or additional revenue resources, and it can come through a part time, or fulltime job. There will be some purchase, but make sure they are not unnecessary purchases too. There will also some issues regarding possessions, assets, or valuables and they will be resolved through careful discussions. The second house also indicates studies, so you will be trying to update your skills, and that will be a value addition to you. Some of you will get public speaking opportunities too.

Transit Venus will enter your ninth house so this will bring multiple opportunities from the foreign lands. There will be long distance or international travel and it can be often for pleasure, learning or spiritual matters. This is the time to meet with people from international locations, and cultures, and you will be learning a lot from them. Venus will also show you some good people during this week, and they also will be from far place. During this week, you will get opportunities to teach, write and publish your articles. This is also an important time for your elderly figures too.

horoscopes.title: Cancer Weekly Horoscope Starting January 11
content: For Cancer Sun, Moon and rising, this week will be very important for your relationships, partnerships, and one-to -one dealings. The Sun, Mars and Mercury are moving through the earth sign of Capricorn, so you will have important conversations with partners and these conversations will lead to clear agreements and commitments. For single Cancer natives , these transits will bring some one, but it will not be wise to fall in love at the first sight. Since the Sun, and Mars are malefics, you should not share any of your personal information with anyone. You will also attend business meets, social gatherings or you will also have job related discussions.

The Sun, Mars and Mercury will aspect the first house, so situations will revolve around you, your choices, and you will be the centre of developments. The first house indicates yourself so, you will try to renew your looks, buy an image makeover. You will have new initiatives, and others will respond directly to your stance and actions. Since two fiery planets are in your sign, so there are chances for mild headache or fever, which is very normal. This planetary influence will reset your personal path, and this is a new phase in your life.

Venus will move into the air sign of Aquarius in the weekend into your eighth house and this is a favourable transit for your financial matters. Venus will bring some money or someone will financially support you. Matters related to loans, debts, taxes and inheritances will move forward smoothly, and you will get some benefits out of it. This is a good time to get closer with your life partner, and with business partner also your relationship will improve. This transit will ease your financial pressures, and you will also be pacified too.

horoscopes.title: Leo Weekly Horoscope Starting January 11
content: The Leo Sun, Moon and rising natives will be focused on the work, debts, diseases and enemies as the Sun, Mars and Mercury are in the sixth house. This is a bit complex phase, as the workload will increase, and multiple tasks or projects will require immediate attention and constant effort. There will be some changes at work, like you may get a new job role, schedules, or responsibilities will change during this week. You will feel the need of restructuring at work, and you will have to be careful with your colleagues. The Sun and Mars are fiery planets and malefics, so there are chances for arguments with them.

This is a good time for job seekers to send their resumes and attend the interviews. The sixth house also indicates health, and that will demand attention, so you will be going for some checkups, tests or treatments, or you will also start wellness routines. These three planets will aspect the twelfth housel so some private matters will surface, and they will move into the decisive phase through endings, and closures. You will go to visit people living in isolated places, like hospitals, legal confinements or retreats. Someone from the past will also come up and you should not entertain them without second thought.

Transit Venus will move to the air sign of Aquarius, and that will bring favourable situation for single Leo Sun, Moon and rising signs. This is a very good transit, so you will supportive people around you, and they will be listening to you. New business partnerships also can come up, despite personal or professional, you will some gains too. Venus will support you to solve the existing relationship issues, and they will improve as there will be more cooperation with them. You will also attend some social gatherings too.

horoscopes.title: Virgo Weekly Horoscope Starting January 11
content: Venus will change the sign, but the Sun, Mars and Mercury will be in Capricorn just like the last week. So, the fifth house of creativity is active, and your creativity will rise and people will notice that. You will be working hard to shift the planning to production , promotion and public presentation. There will be a lot of activities involving children, and you will have to take up more responsibilities from them. The children and youngsters will cross some important milestones in their life too. There will be social gatherings, business meets and you will also go for entertainment programs.

This is not a good phase for speculative events so don’t invest in the high risk projects. There will be a lot of interactions with friends, colleagues, or team members, and you will plan to set some projects with their support. There will be online and offline communications for the progress of the long term projects. These planets will aspect the eleventh house, so you will be very hopeful about your future. However, the Sun and Mars are fiery planets, so you will have some arguments with your team mates or elderly siblings too. Some of you will join a new team as well.

Transit Venus will enter Aquarius, and that will impact the sixth house of work, debts, diseases and enemies, so your productivity at work will increase, Venus will support you to solve the issues at work place, and your colleagues will support you. There will be job related discussions, contracts, or service arrangements will move forward, and there will be positive outcomes. This is a good time to set your daily work in a disciplined mode, and you will be happy about it. However, please try to take care of your diet, as Venus can make you eat unhealthily.

horoscopes.title: Libra Weekly Horoscope Starting January 11
content: For Libra Sun, Moon and rising, the fourth house of home and family will be of utmost importance, as three planets are moving through the fourth house. You can expect significant events connected to home and family, and you will have to take a lot of responsibilities at home. Earlier you were not involving much at home, but this is the time to take up more work. There will be family functions, visitors, real estate deals, and discussions regarding renovations too. The Sun and Mars are also involved with the fourth house, and they will bring some concerns too.

These three planets will aspect the tenth house of career, so you will equally feel responsible at work. Three planets the Sun, Mars and Mercury will surely increase the workload, so, there will be some distraction due to the multiple responsibilities at work as well as at home. However, job seekers will have the closest opportunities to get a new job, so they should use this week to send their resumes, despite getting an interview call. You may get the call later, at some times, so, don’t get discouraged, but keep on trying as the good things will take time to flourish. One thing you need to be careful is to avoid toxic talks at home, and avoid bad talks with the managers.

Venus will move into the fifth house during this weekend, and this is certainly a beautiful transit, as you will have better life than the last week. This transit will bring happiness as you will feel favourable events around you like reconciliations, invites, and social gatherings. There will be some creative projects, and you will promote them, and people will notice your efforts and appreciate you. This is a good transit, for the bond with children, or youngsters, so mostly you will be with them. Children or youngsters will cross some important milestones in their life.

horoscopes.title: Scorpio Weekly Horoscope Starting January 11
content: The Sun, Mars and Mercury are moving through the earth sign of Capricorn, hence your third house is activated. The third house indicates multitasking, so you will have multiple tasks, so you will be busier than usual. There will be conversations which can lead you to concrete decisions, agreements, or confrontations. The Sun and Mars are natural malefics, so there will be some arguments with your network circles or siblings, and you must control your speech. You can also expect short travels, alone or with someone, but there are chances for last minute cancellations as well. There will be paper work, applications, contracts or admin related process too.

These three planets will aspect the ninth house, so you can also expect some updates from the foreign lands or about foreign collaborations. Studies will be another major theme during this transit, so there will be many opportunities to join a course online or offline. Academic matters like admissions, exams, certifications, or supplementary can also come up, but there will be some difficulties as the malefics, Sun and Mars are aspecting the ninth house. This transit can also bring some difficulties for your teachers, mentors or fatherly figures too, and it can be health or legal issues too.

Venus will move into the fourth house during this weekend, which will impact your fourth house in a very positive manner. Family relationships will improve through discussions, reconciliations and shared activities. Since Venus is the planet for beauty, so you will be very keen to beautify your home and surroundings. You will be working hard to set up some real estate deals, and you can also expect renovation. Property related matters like renting, buying, selling or agreements with landlord will move forward smoothly. This transit will surely enhance the domestic harmony and create a better living environment.

horoscopes.title: Sagittarius Weekly Horoscope Starting January 11
content: Three planets are moving through the earth sign of Capricorn, which will impact the second house so your finances and income will be the primary theme during this week. For Sagittarius Sun, Moon and rising signs will have the same focus, and two malefics, the Sun, and Mars are involved in this conjunction, so your expenses will be high and gains will be less. This is a very complex transit, so you should manage with whatever you have and don’t take any unwanted financial commitments. There will be some opportunities to get a new job in a full time or part time mode too.

These three planets will aspect the eighth house, so bills, accounts, and banking matters will be also important. Issues involving loans, debts, taxes, and insurances will surface, but you will deal with them very effectively. Mars will aspect the fifth house, so you will have the tendency to invest in high risk projects, but this is not the time to take up that. Otherwise, the losses will be huge, so kindly postpone such plans until when Mars move out of the fifth house. You will also be interested in exploring your life through mystical sciences,
Venus will move into the third house during this weekend, so you will have a good time with your siblings and network circles. Since Venus is a natural benefic planet, your conversations will be pleasant, so, you will have a good time with your siblings, network circles and friends. The third house indicates communications, so there will be messages, calls, or emails which will bring positive news. Short distance travels will be another theme of this Venus transit and it can be alone or with a group. There will be a lot of work from writing, teaching and publishing related domain.

horoscopes.title: Capricorn Weekly Horoscope Starting January 11
content: This is the solar return time for Capricorn Sun natives, but this is equally important for Capricorn Moon and rising signs as well. The Sun indicates leaders so, you will take leadership roles in your life despite personal or business life. There will be major changes in appearance, life’s direction, or your choices. You are transforming as a new person, so you can expect events like rebranding, new ventures, which will be under your leadership. The Sun and Mars are in your sign, and both are natural malefics, so there are chances for mild health issues like fever or tiredness, which will vanish after this transit.

These planets will aspect the seventh house, so your relationships will be very important, and there will be a lot of one to one dealing. If you are a single, then this is not the time to find someone, so please leave such efforts. If you are going through any relationship issues, then it can get aggravated as the Sun and Mars are aspecting the seventh house so stay away from anything which can damage your relationship. You can also expect some agreements, contracts or legal matters and they will surely move forward.

Venus transit to Aquarius will take place on the weekend, and it will stay here for the next three weeks, and this is a very positive transit, as this will bring some great opportunities to be financially stable. Money will surely come through various ways and it can also be like you getting a new job , or a freelance opportunity. You will be able to settle your financial liabilities, or you will be able to make repayment plans. This transit will also bring comfortable living, and you will also purchase some items for home. You will feel better about yourself than the last week too.

horoscopes.title: Aquarius Weekly Horoscope Starting January 11
content: For Aquarius Sun, Moon and rising signs, this week can be a bit challenging, as three planets, the Sun, Mars and Mercury are moving through the twelfth house of isolation and detachment. Noone of the planets like to be in the twelfth house, so this transit can bring some emotional issues and detachment from some relationships. Some hidden situations, and unresolved problems will surface, so make sure you don’t invite any troubles. The sleep can get troubled, and you will have complex dreams, but they will signal you about the future. You will also be spending time in reading spiritual texts, prayer and meditation.

These three planets will aspect the sixth house, so your work, health and daily responsibilities will be also important. These planets will increase your workload, as there will be multiple tasks or assignments, there will be changes in job duties, schedules or work patterns. Since the Sun and Mars are malefics, there are chances for arguments with your colleagues, so you should avoid unhealthy talks at work. You should also take care of your physical health, especially regarding your lower abdomen. The diet will be very important, and you should avoid all kind of unhealthy food.

Venus will come into your sign by the weekend, so from then onwards, almost all issues will get solved. Venus is a natural benefic, so you will get many opportunities to grow in your life, and others will support you as well. This Venus will fill your heart with the desire to perform well in your life despite the struggles given by the Sun, Mars and Mercury. You will try for a makeover, as you will feel the need for a change altogether. This is also the time for new initiatives, social gatherings, dating and new business ventures too.

horoscopes.title: Pisces Weekly Horoscope Starting January 11
content: For Pisces Sun, Moon and rising signs, long term planning is going on as the Sun, Mars, and Mercury will be impacting the eleventh house. There will be more interaction with your elderly siblings or elderly figures, so you will get new inputs which can be supportive of your long term visions. New people will surely enter your life, and they will come through professional circles, social platforms and community events. There will be group projects, team ventures, and new roles in the team work. If you were trying to join a new organisation, then such opportunities will come up for sure.

These three planets will aspect the fifth house, so you can expect some issues in the team settings as the Sun and Mars are natural malefics and they will bring factions. For single Pisces natives, there are chances, that too strong one, to meet likeminded people, who can be the part of your life. There will be some creative projects and they will progress through production, presentation, promotion or you will get good feed back from the people. There will be multiple projects from arts, media and there will be more support from the youngsters around you.

Venus will change the sign and it will move into Aquarius, and this will be a good transit, and Venus likes to be in the twelfth house. The twelfth house is a private house, so you will find some hidden information, which you were always looking for. Silent support from others will come up, and this may not be the right time to depend upon strangers. Please don’t entertain anyone from the past unless Venus moves out of twelfth house. You will have very good dreams, and they will signal you about your future too. This Venus will also bring spiritual support from the universe as it realises that you need it.
